title: Mexican bean stew
description: A simple, vegetarian, spiced bean stew makes a quick and filling midweek dinner.With a GI of 52 this meal is high protein, low GI and provides 492 kcal per portion.
ingredients: 1 yellow pepper, deseeded and cut into 3cm/1in chunks
400g tin mixed beans, drained and rinsed
1 lime, cut into wedges, to serve
salt and freshly ground black pepper
